meanings.definition: The state or condition of being ruled or governed by dogs.
meanings.sent1: In the land of dogedoms, all decisions are made by our furry friends.
meanings.sent2: The citizens of dogedoms enjoy a peaceful and harmonious society under the leadership of their canine rulers.
meanings.sent3: The idea of dogedoms may seem silly, but imagine a world where dogs are in charge!
meanings.sent4: She jokingly referred to her chaotic household as a dogedoms, with her pets calling all the shots.
meanings.sent5: The concept of dogedoms brings to mind a whimsical image of dogs wearing crowns and holding court.

meanings.definition: The territories or realms controlled by dogs.
meanings.sent1: The vast dogedoms stretched as far as the eye could see, each territory marked by a different breed of dog.
meanings.sent2: Explorers ventured into the uncharted dogedoms, hoping to discover new lands ruled by loyal canines.
meanings.sent3: The dogedoms were divided into regions named after famous dog breeds, like Poodle Province and Labrador Land.
meanings.sent4: The dogedoms stood as a testament to the power and influence of our four-legged companions.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of a mystical portal that led to the heart of the dogedoms, where the most majestic dogs resided.
